controller

Class BattleshipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BattleshipController

  • public class BattleshipController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller manager for the MVC paradigm. It requires a BattleshipModel instance and its task is to assign new panel controllers to the panels who require them.
    Author:
    20027017 & 20031485
